text: Babuganj is an upazila in the Barisal district of Bangladesh. ==population== According to the 2011 census, the total population of Babuganj upazila is 14,0361. Of these, 67,586 are males and 72,775 are females. Total families 31.663. ==Reference== Category:Subdivisions of Bangladesh
title: Babuganj Upazila
